com.milk.util
Class ListenerList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.util.ListenerList
public final class ListenerList
extends java.lang.Object

This is a handy class for holding a list of zero or more EventListeners. It's fairly efficient for storage, and it knows how to do broadcasting with the help of the BaseEvent class, which it is designed to work with.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

Method Summary
 void add(java.util.EventListener listener)
          Add a listener to the list.
 void broadcast(BaseEvent event)
          Broadcast a BaseEvent to all the listeners unconditionally.
 void checkedBroadcast(BaseEvent event)
          Broadcast a BaseEvent to all the listeners that the event thinks it can be sent to (queried with canSendTo()).
 boolean isEmpty()
          Return true if this list has no elements.

Remove a listener from the list.

Parameters:
